sentences.en: " It was in nineteen - nineteen, I only stayed five months.
sentences.cn: “ 是一九一九年, 我只待了五个月.

sentences.en: " Together with those that have been already examined, there are nineteen. "
sentences.cn: " 算上已经查对过的, 一共十九封.

sentences.en: As a novel, Nineteen Eighty-four hardly ranks with the greats.
sentences.cn: 作为一部小说，《一九八四》很难被列为杰作。

sentences.en: At the 207 th Street station, nineteen were arrested for loitering.
sentences.cn: 在207号街车站, 十九个人因游手好闲被捕.

sentences.en: At the age of nineteen he began his duty.
Everybody was puzzled, and nineteen couples were surprised and indignant.
sentences.cn: 事出意外,人人都大惑不解, 那十九对夫妇更是怒气冲冲.

sentences.en: Her tongue goes nineteen to the dozen.
I hadn't left home till I was nineteen.
I was only nineteen (= 19 years old ).
It was nineteen minutes past seven.
Katy Jones is nineteen and comes from Birmingham.
sentences.cn: 凯蒂·琼斯19岁，是伯明翰人。

sentences.en: The book consists of nineteen chapters.
The clock's hands said seventeen - twenty : it was nineteen - twenty really .
sentences.cn: 座钟指着 七点二十—— 该是 十九点二十 啦.

sentences.en: The two old friends were talking nineteen to the dozen.
sentences.cn: 这两个老朋友聊起来没完没了.

sentences.en: The youthful infatuation of nineteen would naturally blind him to everything.
sentences.cn: 十九岁的年轻人的冲动会很自然地使他看不到别的.

sentences.en: When Bill was nineteen, he began to fill out.
sentences.cn: 当比尔十九岁时, 他就开始发胖.
